Philippines not provoking conflict in South China Sea - military spokespersonThe Philippines is not provoking conflict in the South China Sea, the country's military spokesperson said on Tuesday, in response to China's accusation that Manila is encroaching on Beijing's territory. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 05:14:50 GMT UBX2WSIGXBJJHAJL7XJYTQ44XU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-not-provoking-conflict-south-china-sea-military-spokesperson-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
China expects searing heat, more weather extremes in 2024China - grappling with one of its coldest Decembers on record - will likely have to brace for another round of scorching heat and an increase in extreme weather next year due to the El Nino weather phenomenon, a senior climate expert said. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 04:49:05 GMT H2EF2YAKGRKSHE7PF6IZCSENAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expects-searing-heat-more-weather-extremes-2024-2023-12-26/Liz Lee世界中国
Taiwan not seeing signs of large-scale Chinese military activity pre-electionTaiwan is not seeing any signs of large-scale Chinese military activity before elections next month but is keeping a close watch on China, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 04:07:50 GMT NQS6HJDMN5M2RBDOQJ4UBFTMB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-not-seeing-signs-large-scale-chinese-military-activity-pre-election-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Asian stocks stutter, dollar drifts as US rate cut bets riseAsian stocks traded tentatively on Tuesday, while the dollar lurked near a five-month low as cooling U.S. inflation bolstered bets the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates soon. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 02:30:15 GMT N5ELOQ5RNJOEROHZZPOE44UGOU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2023-12-26/Ankur Banerjee市场
China warns rocket remnants to hit South China SeaChina warned that remnants of a rocket would hit an area in the South China Sea on Tuesday, following the sixth deployment of its most powerful launch vehicle eleven days ago. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:39:57 GMT TBHRLQLGCJPELGK6EVQXXIFXVA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-rocket-remnants-hit-south-china-sea-maritime-safety-authority-2023-12-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Dollar struggles to gain footing in thin trade; yen steadyThe dollar was trying to find a floor on Tuesday in holiday-thinned trade, pressured by signs that inflation in the world's largest economy is cooling that will likely give the Federal Reserve room to ease interest rates next year. Tue, 26 Dec 2023 01:14:30 GMT FVEZP2TDSbierpempai3JLNMBY https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-struggles-gain-footing-thin-trade-yen-steady-2023-12-26/Rae Wee市场货币
China to provide consular assistance to Vivo employees arrested in IndiaChina will provide consular protection and assistance to two Chinese employees of smartphone maker Vivo arrested by Indian authorities and urges India not to discriminate against Chinese companies, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 08:59:54 GMT TIARG5RVI5KTRMIYGJN4YFHTRE https://www.reuters.com/world/india/china-provide-consular-assistance-vivo-employees-arrested-india-2023-12-25/Reuters世界印度
Christmas in China brings glittering decor and foreign influence concernsGiant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 05:30:59 GMT AHZ5DQYFLVP3HFF4NCSN2TKEZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/christmas-china-brings-glittering-decor-foreign-influence-concerns-2023-12-25/Ryan Woo世界中国
Philippine actions in South China Sea 'extremely dangerous' - Chinese state mediaChinese state media accused the Philippines on Monday of repeatedly infringing on China's territory in the South China Sea, spreading false information and colluding with extraterritorial forces to cause trouble. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 01:52:59 GMT Z6SWATAKZVP5LIJM4GX4LNA7A4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-actions-south-china-sea-extremely-dangerous-chinese-state-media-2023-12-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
China earthquake death toll rises to 149, two still missing after a weekOne of China's most powerful earthquakes in recent years straddled the Gansu and Qinghai provinces in an area where many of China's Hui people, a tight-knit ethnic minority, are found. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 00:28:18 GMT 6NMNDMCP5NRXDOA265M7AR6KY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-earthquake-death-toll-rises-149-two-still-missing-after-week-2023-12-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Beijing breaks a seven-decade cold-weather recordSome areas in the northeast hit -40 degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit as biting cold air flowed from the Arctic. A Beijing observatory recorded more than 300 hours of below-freezing temperatures since Dec. 11. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 06:56:38 GMT EQ2PK257VFNMZHFBUGZ7QMUVKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-henan-province-hit-by-shortage-winter-heating-after-cold-wave-2023-12-24/Reuters世界中国
